channel.title: Typography on Smylingsas.net
channel.description: Recent content in Typography on Smylingsas.net

item.title: CSS white space property
item.description: The white space property is a text/content related css property used to controll the flow of the text. p { white-space: pre-line } Sequences of whitespace will collapse into a single whitespace. Text will wrap when necessary, and on line breaks
